item.description:
September meetup was super fun. So let's try it again. Some had to leave early before P.Y.T. came on! The dance floor at 121 was just perfect, not too crowded. They've refinished the wood floors and now have guinness on tap.

We'll start again at the Congress as a good meeting spot. Around 10:30 we'll go over to Local 121, for those who want or meander over whenever you'd like.

Â 

The music is not all 80s but it's danceable. Some rare tunes - you'll hear a range from M.J., disco/funk, Depeche Mode & New Order, to DeeLite groove is in the heart.
item.name: Handsome Pete - REPEAT
